nio/CounterIntervalSimulator.description: Simulates and emits a signal containing an integer every [interval] seconds.

nio/CounterSafeSimulator.description: Simulates and emits a signal containing an integer every [interval] seconds, even if not all signals have been simulated.
nio/CounterSafeSimulator.tags: simulator genenerator first count start counter

nio/FileIntervalSimulator.description: Creates signals as defined by a json file.
nio/FileIntervalSimulator.tags: simulator generator first start file json import read

nio/IdentityCronSimulator.description: Simulate and emit signals according to a cron-like timetable.
nio/IdentityCronSimulator.tags: simulator generator first start time cron schedule

nio/IdentityIntervalSimulator.description: Simulates and emits empty signals every [interval] seconds.
nio/IdentityIntervalSimulator.tags: simulator generator first start empty signal synchronous
